videos.description: Cade Cunningham tries to drive in for a layup, but Blake Griffin swats the attempt out of bounds.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Griffin denies Cunningham at the rim) 2021/12/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Griffin denies Cunningham at the rim

videos.description: Cade Cunningham comes up with a steal and breaks away to the bucket for a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham converts steal into a dunk) 2021/12/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham converts steal into a dunk

videos.description: Kevin Durant knocks down a game-tying 3-pointer to give him 43 points on the game.
videos.headline: Durant ties game with 3-pointer

videos.description: Cade Cunningham shows off the moves to get by Kevin Durant for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham gets by Durant for the bucket) 2021/12/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham gets by Durant for the bucket
